summary: This is an email from March 18, 2021, regarding the review of evidence in the Epstein case. It indicates that a confirmed date for evidence review is not yet set and instructs that digital evidence does not need to be pulled at that time. The email involves the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force.

events.title: Email Correspondence on Evidence Review
events.description: An email is sent regarding the Epstein evidence list, stating there is no confirmed date for evidence review and that digital evidence does not need to be pulled at that time.

keyFacts: An email dated March 18, 2021, discusses the Epstein evidence list and review process.
There was no confirmed date for the evidence to be reviewed as of that email.
The NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force was involved in the correspondence.
Instructions were given not to pull the digital evidence at that time.
